message: So it drives me crazy that we overlap with Cleveland GiveCamp *and* Ann Arbor MakerFaire this year.  We've consistently been the last weekend of July - already reserved 2012 space, in fact.  I hear Cleveland GiveCamp will be July 20-22 next year (whew) but I'm wondering which people we need to contact and try to persuade to avoid 2012 conflicts.
'cause if GiveCamp moved *off* our weekend, somebody else might come along and move their event *onto* it.  Wish conferences would stake out their days years in advance on lanyrd or something.
I think it's unavoidable. Something somewhere is going to conflict with any event, though it would be nice if Makerfaire was on a different weekend. :)
